abstract: Background The QRS area shows promise as a vectorcardiographic (VCG) marker for electrical dyssynchrony in patient selection for cardiac resynchronization therapy (CRT). Nevertheless, little information is known about the underlying cardiac …

title: Ensemble machine learning for predicting in-hospital mortality in Asian women with ST-elevation myocardial infarction (STEMI)
details: S Kasim, PNFA Rudin, S Malek, KS Ibrahim… - Scientific reports, 2024
abstract: The accurate prediction of in-hospital mortality in Asian women after ST-Elevation Myocardial Infarction (STEMI) remains a crucial issue in medical research. Existing models frequently neglect this demographic's particular attributes, resulting in poor …
